languages.text: Кровавая паутина предоставила Инквизиции многих смертоносных агентов, но противоречия между шепотами Неумирающего и волей Лорд-инквизитора накапливались многие годы. В итоге культ смерти раскололся, пролились реки крови. Часть служителей Неумирающего отреклась от Висиря и основала беззаветно преданный Инквизиции культ — Тени Трона. На удивление, схизма не вызвала недовольства Висиря Кибеллы: в ее глазах новое учение нашло собственную стезю в служении Неумирающему. Лорд-инквизитор ван Калокс же до последнего дня пребывал в раздумиях о том, сколько искренности было в сердцах отступников, вставших под его команду.

Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. Eventually, the death cult splintered apart, and rivers of blood were spilt. A number of the Undying One's servants renounced their Vizsier and founded a new cult bound by absolute loyalty to the Inquisition, which they named Shadows of the Throne. Contrary to expectations, Vizsier Kibellah was not angered by the schism — instead, she saw the new teaching as another thread of service to the Undying Emperor. Until the end of his days, Lord Inquisitor van Calox wondered just how much sincerity there was in the hearts of the renegades who had agreed to serve under his command.

languages.text: Aunque la Red Sanguinolenta procuró numerosos asesinos a la Inquisición, las contradicciones entre los susurros del Emperador Inmortal y la voluntad del Lord Inquisidor fueron agravándose con el paso de los años. Al final el culto de la Muerte terminó escindiéndose y se vertieron ríos de sangre. Algunos siervos del Inmortal dieron la espalda a su Visir y fundaron un nuevo culto que profesaba una lealtad absoluta a la Inquisición: las Sombras del Trono. Contra toda expectativa, aquel cisma no preocupó a la visir Kibellah, quien veía la nueva doctrina como otra urdimbre más en el servicio al Emperador Inmortal. Hasta el final de sus días, el Lord Inquisidor van Calox nunca estuvo seguro de la sinceridad que albergaban los corazones de los renegados que accedieron a trabajar para él.
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブは異端審問庁に致命的な諜報員を提供したが、不死の皇帝の囁きとロード・インクィジターの意志の間の矛盾は、年月が経つにつれて徐々に大きくなっていった。やがて死のカルトは分裂し、血の川が流れた。不死の者の下僕の多くがヴィジールを放棄し、異端審問庁への絶対的な忠誠で結ばれた新たな教団を創設し、彼らは「玉座の影」と名付けた。予想に反して、ヴィジール・キベラはこの分裂に怒ることはなかった。その代わりに、彼女はこの新しい教えを、不死の皇帝へのもう一つの奉仕の糸と考えた。ロード・インクィジター・ヴァン・カロックスは最後まで、自分の指揮下に入った反逆者たちの心にどれほどの誠意があるのか疑問に思っていた。
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. Eventually, the death cult splintered apart, and rivers of blood were spilt. A number of the Undying One's servants renounced their Vizsier and founded a new cult bound by absolute loyalty to the Inquisition, which they named Shadows of the Throne. Contrary to expectations, Vizsier Kibellah was not angered by the schism — instead, she saw the new teaching as another thread of service to the Undying Emperor. Until the end of his days, Lord Inquisitor van Calox wondered just how much sincerity there was in the hearts of the renegades who had agreed to serve under his command.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブは異端審問庁に致命的な諜報員を提供したが、不死の皇帝の囁きとロード・インクィジターの意志の間の矛盾は、年月が経つにつれて徐々に大きくなっていった。やがて死のカルトは分裂し、血の川が流れた。不死の者の下僕の多くがヴィジールを放棄し、異端審問庁への絶対的な忠誠で結ばれた新たな教団を創設し、彼らは「玉座の影」と名付けた。予想に反して、ヴィジール・キベラはこの分裂に怒ることはなかった。その代わりに、彼女はこの新しい教えを、不死の皇帝へのもう一つの奉仕の糸と考えた。ロード・インクィジター・ヴァン・カロックスは最後まで、自分の指揮下に入った反逆者たちの心にどれほどの誠意があるのか疑問に思っていた。

languages.text: 尽管织血罗网为审判庭提供了许多技艺精湛的特工，但随着时间流逝，不死神皇的低语与大审判官的意愿之间矛盾日益加剧。最终，拜死教四分五裂，血流成河。许多原本侍奉不死神皇的仆人不再追随宿老的指挥，而是建立了新的教派，对审判庭保持着绝对忠诚。这些人自称为“王座之影”。出人意料的是，宿老绮贝菈并没有被这样的分裂行为激怒，相反，她将这支新的教派看作侍奉不死神皇的另一条丝线。至于冯·卡洛克斯大审判官，直到他生命的最后一刻，他都始终在怀疑那些从织血罗网分裂出来的教徒在听从他的指挥时，心里究竟怀着多少诚意。
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. Eventually, the death cult splintered apart, and rivers of blood were spilt. Contrary to expectations, Vizsier Kibellah was not angered by the schism — instead, she saw the new teaching as another thread of service to the Undying Emperor. Until the end of his days, Lord Inquisitor van Calox wondered just how much sincerity there was in the hearts of the renegades who had agreed to serve under his command.

languages.text: Obwohl das Blutgesponnene Netz der Inquisition viele tödliche Agenten schickte, nahmen die Widersprüche zwischen dem Flüstern des Todlosen Imperators und dem Willen des Großinquisitors im Laufe der Jahre langsam zu. Schließlich zerfiel der Todeskult und es wurde viel Blut vergossen. Einige Diener des Todlosen entsagten ihrem Wesir und gründeten mit dem Schatten des Throns einen neuen Kult, der der Inquisition treu ergeben war. Entgegen aller Erwartungen war Wesir Kibellah ob dieses Schismas nicht erzürnt ... stattdessen betrachtete sie die neue Lehre als weiteren Faden im Dienst des Todlosen Imperators. Bis zum Ende seiner Tage fragte sich Großinquisitor van Calox, wie aufrichtig die Herzen der Renegaten waren, die sich seinem Befehl unterworfen hatten.
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. Eventually, the death cult splintered apart, and rivers of blood were spilt. Until the end of his days, Lord Inquisitor van Calox wondered just how much sincerity there was in the hearts of the renegades who had agreed to serve under his command.

languages.text: Bien que la Toile de Sang eût fourni de nombreux agents redoutables à l'Inquisition, les conflits entre les murmures de l'Empereur Immortel et la volonté du seigneur inquisiteur s'aggravèrent lentement au fil des années. Jusqu'au jour où le culte de la mort finit par se scinder en deux phalanges rivales, pavant la voie d'un véritable bain de sang. Une partie des serviteurs de l'Immortel renia la vizir pour fonder les Ombres du Trône, une nouvelle secte liée par sa loyauté absolue envers l'Inquisition. Contre toute attente, la vizir Kibellah ne condamna pas le schisme. Au contraire, elle vit dans ces nouveaux enseignements une autre manière de servir son dieu. Quant au seigneur inquisiteur van Calox, il passa le restant de ses jours à se questionner sur la sincérité des renégats qui avaient accepté de se soumettre à son commandement.
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by. languages.text: Kanipi Ağı, her ne kadar Engizisyon'a nice ölümcül ajan sağlamış olsa da Ölmeyen İmparator'un fısıltıları ile Lord Engizisyoncu'nun arzusu arasındaki çelişkiler, geçen yıllarla birlikte yavaşça arttı. En nihayetinde ölüm tarikatı ayrıldı ve kan nehir gibi aktı. Ölmeyen'in birkaç hizmetkârı, Vezir'i reddederek Engizisyon'a mutlak sadakatle bağlı yeni bir tarikat kurdu. Tarikata Taht'ın Gölgeleri adını verdiler. Kibellah, beklentilerin aksine bu bölünme karşısında öfkeye kapılmadı. Bunun yerine yeni öğretiyi Ölmeyen İmparator'a hizmet için uzanan başka bir iplik olarak gördü. Lord Engizisyoncu van Calox, komutası altında hizmet etmeye razı gelen hainlerin yüreğinde ne kadar samimiyet yattığını ömrünün sonuna dek merak edip durdu.
languages.original_text: Although the Bloodspun Web provided the Inquisition with many deadly agents, the contradictions between the Undying Emperor's whispers and the will of the Lord Inquisitor slowly grew as the years went by.
